name: Ash Pash Demo
description:
We Hope you enjoy this Demo. This game is in full development, and with your continued support we aim to release New levels, New Puzzles & New things to discover each week. 

Join Ash-Pash Chippie on her adventures as she explores Happyville with the help of her friends and a secret map that she found. I wonder what we might find along the way?

The creative and development team of B2 Gaming is proud to present Ash-Pash Chippie. This fun filled educational game is packed with puzzles, riddles and mini games that teaches 6-9 year olds all about the world they live in, whilst giving them a better grip on Problem solving, Spelling, Maths, Safety and their Environment.

Updates
New levels and stages will be unlocked every week for game subscribers.
New maps to be unlocked every 30 days.


Features
* Solving Puzzles
* Find the Hidden Objects
* Matching Shapes, Objects & Colours
* Escape the maze
* Catch the Pancakes
* Spelling and Number Puzzles
* New Updates every week

Educational Benefits
* Numbers and Letters
* Words and Spelling
* Mathematics

WHAT'S NEW

Fellow Happyville residents and fans of Ash Pash Chippie. We hope you enjoy this first release Demo of Ash Pash Chippie. Updates will occur weekly with new games and levels or maps. We thank you for your support...No really we do. We will strive to deliver the most entertaining games we can to you. New kids on the block rock.
